instructions:
COFFEE-AMARETTO
4 rounded scoops vanilla ice cream
2 tbsp milk
2 oz Amaretto cordial
1 tsp instant coffee crystals
Mix as above. Serves 2.

HUMMER
4 rounded scoops vanilla ice cream
2 tbsp milk
2 oz Kahluah cordial
1 oz rum
Mix as above. Serves 2.

PONY MALT
5 rounded scoops chocolate ice cream
1/4 cup milk
3 heaping tbsp malted milk
Mix as above. Serves 2. 
*(Rev. 8/8/92)*
ingredients: Mix above ingredients in a blender or milk shake mixer until completely blended. Serves 2.
name: Ice Cream Cocktails
